metadata.title: CVE-2022-43042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC 2.1-DEV-rev368-gfd054169b-master was discovered to contain a heapbuffer overflow via the function FixSDTPInTRAF at isomedia/isom_intern.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
